item.title: Bar plots
item.description: This is our last data visualization that we will be doing! We are going to work on the bar plots. library(Lahman) ## Warning: package 'Lahman' was built under R version 3.4.2 library(sqldf) ## Warning: package 'sqldf' was built under R version 3.4.2 ## Loading required package: gsubfn ## Loading required package: proto ## Loading required package: RSQLite library(ggplot2) ## Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 3.4.2 With a bar plot, we will look at the team homerun totals for all the MLB teams in 1980.
